title: Calories in a Donut
meta_description: Discover calories in a donut, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, fat, protein, and easy tweaks for variations under 160 characters.
assumptions: Standard glazed yeast donut, approximately 60g, no fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type, brand, size, glaze, and frying method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard glazed donut contains about 250 calories and 28g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a glazed donut?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for a standard 60g glazed yeast donut.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a donut?
faqs.a: Typically 28g of carbs, including 14g sugars and 1g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a donut high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 14g total fat with 7g saturated fat per donut.
Similar to glazed, about 240-260 kcal; powder adds minimal calories.

faqs.q: How does donut size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger donuts (80g+) can reach 350+ kcal; mini versions under 100 kcal.
